name: DGCP Proof 425 | Morning Animal Health Check — Jan 2, 2026
description:
This proof documents the first task of the day at MaMeeFarm™:
a health check of animals living on the farm.

The observation includes multiple dogs and puppies.
One small puppy was observed with weak hind legs and abnormal walking behavior,
compared to other puppies of similar age.

This record reflects direct, real-world observation without diagnosis,
intervention, or interpretation beyond visible physical condition.

Captured as part of the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.
No staging. No reconstruction. No backfilled data.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
This work is licensed under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.
All content is part of the MaMeeFarm™ Real-Work Data & Philosophy archive.
Redistribution, citation, or derivative use must preserve attribution and license reference.
